name: Goat's Milk Soap
description:
All of our soaps are mild and skin soothing, but there's something about the extra butterfat in the goat's milk soaps that makes them especially nice for the skin.

We get the goat's milk from a friend of ours who's a dairy farmer--and in our goal of making our soap as local as possible, the goat's milk soaps are around 19% local.

And just like all of our soaps--they are hard & long-lasting, make lots of suds, and leave your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

We have four different scents to choose from--

The sweet & bracing  Mint & Rosemary Soap is great for morning wake up--kinda takes the edge off of starting the day. It is a pale tan speckled with dark mint.

Magic Soap is designed for delicate complexions--the lavender & chamomile are skin beneficial.  It is a creamy off-white speckled with chamomile.

The Honey & Oatmeal Soap truly does smell like honey, milk & oatmeal together--it's one of our all time steady sellers--everyone likes it. Light tan and creamy, with the gentle scrubbiness of oatmeal--this soap is wonderful morning, noon or night.

Warm Spice is scented with cinnamon, cloves, allspice & a hint of apple--it is colored with warm red clay. The scent will linger on your skin for awhile.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, rice bran and castor oils, goatâ€™smilk, various essential oils, fragrance, & botanicals & clays  depending on the soap.

name: New Jersey Soap--56% Local
description:
No NJ jokes, please....a hard fact about soap is that most of the ingredients come from halfway around the world. Since a goal here at Storybook Farm is to be as local as we can,  we came up with the NJ Local soaps. 

We are able to make these soaps 56% local by using local plants & vegetables, and  by substituting buffalo tallow from a local farm for some of the oils in the soap.  These are the only soaps we make that aren't veggie.

There are five different New Jersey Local soaps-- honoring  different areas and products of NJ:

NJ Pinelands is scented with pine, cedar & spruce--woodsy and fresh.  It is swirled with green oxide.

NJ Shore evokes the salty brine of the sea.  

NJ Garden State has heirloom tomato puree & calendula petals.  It is scented with  tomato leaf & raspberry.

NJ Blackberry is deep purple and smells exactly like a tart ripe blackberry.

NJ Violet is  pale purple & reminds us of the secret violets found in the deep woods.

And just like all of our soaps--they are hard & long-lasting, make lots of suds, and leave your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: buffalo tallow, soy, coconut, castor and rice bran oils, well water, lye, & various fragrances, essential oils, colors, clays, oxides, vegetables & botanicals.

name: Hippie Days
description:
Patchouli....it brings back memories--gotta love it--but not straight--it needs to be toned down a bit--after all, it's a new century. So we blend it with a touch of orange and some vanilla --and it becomes something new and rather mysterious.

There's some hibiscus tea, too, for old time's sake--remember Red Zinger?

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, castor, and rice bran oils, water. lye, patchouli, hibiscus tea, fragrance

name: Green Tea Soap
description:
This soap is not perfumy--it has the true tang of tea--that tannic pucker-- but with a slightly floral sweetness. It is truly mellow--if you feel the need to decompress, this is the soap for you.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

Ingredients:  palm, soy, coconut, castor, and rice bran oils, green tea, French green clay, fragrance.

name: Unrefined Shea Butter
description:
Unrefined shea butter may just be a miracle.  It moisturizes and heals skin like nobody's business.  We put it in almost all of our skin care products, we love it so much-- but here it is, plain & simple, to be used anywhere that needs some softening and healing.

You probably already know this, so skip ahead, but shea butter comes from the nut of the African Karite tree.  The nuts are gathered by village women, and they process them into the butter and ship it to us.  

The only addition we make is some essential oil --unrefined shea is slightly smoky in scent, & not everyone loves this, so we try to sweeten it a bit.

ingredients:  unrefined shea butter from Mali, patchouli, lavender, & amber essential oils.

name: Ginger Lemongrass Soap
description:
One of our most popular soaps.  Scented with ginger & lemongrass essential oils & with ground up lemongrass leaves for the scrub.

It's sweet, warm & citrussy--invigorating in the shower--it makes getting up in the morning worthwhile.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, rice bran & castor oils, water, lye, lemongrass, lemongrass EO, fragrance.

name: Flaxseed Soap
description:
Flaxseed--how surprising--not just a wonderful food, it's super in a bar of soap.  The scrubbiness & oil of flaxseed  work beautifully in soap.  The scent is a fresh herbal blend--stimulating & energizing.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, rice bran & castor oils, water, lye, ground flaxseed, fragrance.

name: Boo Boo Balm
description:
Just what you need for those small scrapes and cuts, rashes and burns--basically any of the skin problems that happen every day.  Works fine to soften a dry, rough patch of skin, also.

It is simple yet effective--olive oil infused with healing herbs, shea butter, beeswax, tea tree and lavender essential oils--every ingredient is there to soothe and protect.

Don't use on any deep or weeping wounds as comfrey can close up a wound too fast and cause problems underneath.

ingredients: olive oil infused with comfrey, arnica & calendula, shea butter, beeswax, tea tree & lavender EOs.

2 ounces

name: Charcoal Soap
description:
Mysterious and dark--Charcoal Soap is slightly smoky, a little sweet, with echoes of the spicy scents of the Far East.  The charcoal is made right on the Farm--of cherrywood.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, castor and rice bran oils, water, lye, fragrance, patchouli, cedar and may chang EOs, charcoal.

name: Lemon Balm Soap
description:
The scent of Lemon Balm is totally addictive, a fragrance that is never stale.  It's a combination of fresh lemon & green herbiness. The lemon balm in the soap is grown right here on Storybook Farm.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, castor and rice bran oils, water, lye, fragrance, lemon balm, FD&C dye.

name: Sunflower Soap
description:
Sunny yellow in color and sunny in fragrance--Sunflower is a green and lively floral--true to the idea of a sunflower.  Our own calendula petals are scattered through the soap

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, rice bran  & castor oils, water, lye, calendula petals, fragrance, FD&C dye.

name: Night Orange Soap
description:
This soap was a mistake--a hurried soapmaker threw some essential oils into the wrong pot--but we decided that orange & vanilla together are a team--the soap was so delicious it was quickly added to the roster. 

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, olive, coconut, castor and rice bran oils, water, lye, vanillin & orange essential oil. .

name: Dead Sea Mud Soap
description:
Frankly, we thought that Dead Sea Mud was just about label wow--but, we admit it, we were wrong!  

It is pretty fabulous stuff.  Even in soap, a rinse off product, you can notice it--it makes the soap  creamier, and your skin feels  smooth & soft after washing with it.  

The scent is  spa-ish--rosemary & peppermint with a touch of fresh cucumber--very invigorating.

And just like all of our soaps--it is hard & long-lasting, makes lots of suds, and leaves your skin soft and soothed.  Our guarantee--your skin will not squeak after using our soap.

ingredients: palm, soy, coconut, castor and rice bran oils, water, lye, dead sea mud, rosemary & peppermint EOs, fragrance. cucumber.

name: Solid Lotion Bar
description:
This lotion bar is just what your skin needs --it is a heavy-duty barrier type skin treatment in a convenient solid form. It comes in a tin so you can take it with you during the day.  

It will melt with the warmth of your skin--you can use it on cracked fingers, cuticles, knees, elbows, the skin on your heels and the bottom of your feet--anywhere that needs some emergency relief! I even use it on my lips.

It comes in three scents--

Vanilla Patchouli--sweet & earthy.

Lavender--love that scent--and lavender is skin soothing also.

Lemon Verbena--can't get enough of this--a greeny slightly sweet & herbaceous  lemon.


Ingredients: beeswax, shea butter, coconut , olive, & rice bran oils, fragrance &/or essential oils.

2 ounces

name: Pure & Simple Olive Oil Cream
description:
A rich cream that sinks in slowly--made of the nicest things--extra virgin olive oil, shea butter & local honey are the main ingredients --it couldn't be any simpler. Can be used on face, hands or body--and ideal for winter dry skin.  

The fragrance is clean, bright, lemon verbena.  We used to add a different scent for each batch to keep things interesting, but the lemon verbena is so lovely that there's no chance of a change.

 It's made in small batches to guarantee quality, & made often-- around every two weeks,  to keep up with demand.

ingredients: water, olive oil, shea butter, honey, e-wax, stearic acid, preservative, fragrance.

The jar is 8 ounces.
